cleaned_text: Classic Crystal Rainbows Style: Regular Rainbow Earrings Size: approx. 3.5 inches Weight: Less than half an ounce, virtually weightless! Metal: Stainless steel to accommodate even the most sensitive of ears Plating: Gold Our pieces are designed specifically for people with sensitive skin and ears. ALL of our pieces are hypoallergenic and free of nickel. We strive to provide you with MAXIMAL sparkle and MINIMAL weight. Not sure what size to snag?
